General.Name: Hotel Fitra International Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Hotel Fitra International Tbk engages in hotel business in Indonesia. The company operates Fitra Hotel located in Majalengka. It also operates convention halls, as well as provides tourism services. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Majalengka, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. KH Abdul Halim No.88 RT. 005 RW. 008, Majalengka, Indonesia, 45418
